thread.title: Young Thug: Drake Is "One Of The Realest Rappers I Know"
thread.title_full: Young Thug: Drake Is "One Of The Realest Rappers I Know"

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Young Thug: Drake Is "One Of The Realest Rappers I Know"
text:
Home > Music > Young Thug: Drake Is "One Of The Realest Rappers I Know" Young Thug: Drake Is "One Of The Realest Rappers I Know" 5 1 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Feb 18, 2017 at 11:24am Young Thug salutes Drake on Instagram. 
Young Thug is feeling grateful. 
Thug is opening for Drake on his European "Boy Meets World" tour. With his portion of the tour coming to a close this upcoming week, Thug took the opportunity early Saturday morning to share a picture of him with his arm draped over Drake's shoulder on Instagram and applaud the Toronto star in the caption. 
Thanks for this journey my brada," Thug wrote. "u 1 of the realist rappers I know... very GgenuinNe man and brada, I love the way u treat me and respect me and my heart!!! YOU R NUN LIKE THESE OTHER RAPPERS. I mean ALL OF EM.... And for that I'm with u foreva!" 
Thug will leave the "Boy Meets World" tour after February 23rd and return for three dates in the UK in late March. A post shared by ""JEFFERY"" (@thuggerthugger1) on Feb 17, 2017 at 9:15pm PST
